conformance.rmi

Class ThreadTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • test.Test
      • conformance.rmi.ThreadTest

  • public class ThreadTest
extends Test
    Checks that the skeleton supports multiple simultaneous connections.

    These tests are best performed after SkeletonTest and StubTest. This test starts a skeleton and creates a stub of type TestInterface. It then calls rendezvous on the stub from two different threads. The test succeeds if both calls return.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  ThreadTest.SecondThread
      Wakes the other thread, which is waiting for the reply from the server.
      private class  ThreadTest.TestSkeleton
      Test skeleton class that fails the test when an exception is received in one of the skeleton's threads.
